Class User

java.lang.Object
model.User
Direct Known Subclasses:
CompanyRepresentative, Staff, Student
public abstract class User extends Object
Abstract base class representing a user in the Internship Placement System. This class provides common functionality for all user types including authentication, profile management, and session handling.
Since:
2025-11-16
Version:
1.0
Author:
NTU SC2002 Group

  • Constructor Details

    • User

      public User(String userID, String name, String password, String email)
      Constructs a new User with the specified credentials.
      Parameters:
      userID - unique identifier for the user
      name - display name of the user
      password - authentication password
      email - email address

  • Method Details

    • getUserID

      public String getUserID()
      Gets the unique user identifier.
      Returns:
      the user ID

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Gets the user's display name.
      Returns:
      the name

    • getEmail

      public String getEmail()
      Gets the user's email address.
      Returns:
      the email

    • getPassword

      protected String getPassword()
      Gets the user's password (protected access).
      Returns:
      the password

    • getPasswordForPersistence

      public String getPasswordForPersistence()
      Gets the user's password for persistence operations. Used by CSV handlers to save password data.
      Returns:
      the password

    • isLoggedIn

      public boolean isLoggedIn()
      Checks if the user is currently logged in.
      Returns:
      true if logged in, false otherwise

    • setName

      public void setName(String name)
      Sets the user's display name.
      Parameters:
      name - the new name (must not be empty)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if name is empty or null

    • setEmail

      public void setEmail(String email)
      Sets the user's email address.
      Parameters:
      email - the new email (must be valid format)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if email format is invalid

    • setLoggedIn

      public void setLoggedIn(boolean loggedIn)
      Sets the user's login status.
      Parameters:
      loggedIn - true to mark as logged in, false otherwise

    • verifyPassword

      public boolean verifyPassword(String pw)
      Verifies if the provided password matches the user's password.
      Parameters:
      pw - the password to verify
      Returns:
      true if password matches, false otherwise

    • logout

      public void logout()
      Logs out the user by setting their login status to false.

    • changePassword

      public void changePassword(String oldPassword, String newPassword)
      Changes the user's password after verifying the old password.
      Parameters:
      oldPassword - the current password for verification
      newPassword - the new password to set
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if old password is incorrect or new password is empty

    • getUserType

      public abstract String getUserType()
      Gets the user type as a string. Must be implemented by subclasses to identify their specific user type.
      Returns:
      the user type (e.g., "Student", "Staff", "CompanyRepresentative")

    • getCsvFilename

      public abstract String getCsvFilename()
      Gets the CSV filename for persisting this user type. Uses polymorphism to eliminate instanceof checks. Must be implemented by subclasses to return their specific CSV file path.
      Returns:
      the CSV file path for this user type
